instructions.name: withdrawFromFee
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the Holy House Fee Account to a provided destination account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Holy House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: withdrawFromTreasury
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the Holy House Treasury Account to a provided destination account.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Holy House.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Holy House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: holyHouseTreasury
docs: Holy House treasury PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: updateHouse
docs: Update Holy House values such as seller fee basis points, update authority, treasury account, etc.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Key paying SOL fees for setting up the Holy House.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Holy House.

accounts.name: newAuthority
docs: New authority key for the Holy House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Holy House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestinationOwner
docs: Owner of the `treasury_withdrawal_destination` account or the same address if the `treasury_mint` is native.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: createHouse
docs: Create a new Holy House instance.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Key paying SOL fees for setting up the Holy House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Holy House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestinationOwner
docs: Owner of the `treasury_withdrawal_destination` account or the same address if the `treasury_mint` is native.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

accounts.name: holyHouseTreasury
docs: Holy House instance treasury PDA account.

instructions.name: delist
docs: Cancel a bid or ask by revoking the token delegate, transferring all lamports from the trade state account to the fee payer, and setting the trade state account data to zero so it can be garbage collected.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: SPL token account containing the token of the sale to be canceled.

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: Token mint account of SPL token.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Holy House instance authority account.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

accounts.name: tradeState
docs: Trade state PDA account representing the bid or ask to be canceled.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit `amount` into the escrow payment account for your specific wallet.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: paymentAccount
docs: User SOL or SPL account to transfer funds from.

accounts.name: transferAuthority
docs: SPL token account transfer authority.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Holy House instance treasury mint account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Holy House instance authority account.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

accounts.name: buyer
docs: Buyer user wallet account.

accounts.name: seller
docs: Seller user wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: Token account where the SPL token is stored.

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: Token mint account for the SPL token.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: Metaplex metadata account decorating SPL mint account.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Holy House treasury mint account.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account.

accounts.name: sellerPaymentReceiptAccount
docs: Seller SOL or SPL account to receive payment at.

accounts.name: buyerReceiptTokenAccount
docs: Buyer SPL token account to receive purchased item at.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Holy House instance authority.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

accounts.name: holyHouseTreasury
docs: Holy House instance treasury account.

accounts.name: buyerTradeState
docs: Buyer trade state PDA account encoding the buy order.

accounts.name: sellerTradeState
docs: Seller trade state PDA account enco ding the sell order.

accounts.name: freeTradeState
docs: Free seller trade state PDA account encoding a free sell order.

docs: User wallet account.

docs: SPL token account containing token for sale.

docs: Metaplex metadata account decorating SPL mint account.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the escrow payment account for your specific wallet.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: receiptAccount
docs: SPL token account or native SOL account to transfer funds to. If the account is a native SOL account, this is the same as the wallet address.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Holy House instance treasury mint account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Holy House instance authority account.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: holyHouseFeeAccount
docs: Holy House instance fee account.

instructions.name: closeEscrowAccount
docs: Close the escrow account of the user.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: holyHouse
docs: Holy House instance PDA account.

errors.name: ExpectedSolAccount
errors.msg: Expected a sol account but got an spl token account instead

errors.name: SOLWalletMustSign
errors.msg: If paying with sol, sol wallet must be signer

errors.name: CannotTakeThisActionWithoutHolyHouseSignOff
errors.msg: Cannot take this action without holy house signing too

errors.name: NoPayerPresent
errors.msg: No payer present on this txn

errors.name: BothPartiesNeedToAgreeToSale
errors.msg: Both parties need to agree to this sale

errors.name: CannotMatchFreeSalesWithoutHolyHouseOrSellerSignoff
errors.msg: Cannot match free sales unless the holy house or seller signs off

errors.name: SellerATACannotHaveDelegate
errors.msg: Seller ata cannot have a delegate set

errors.name: BuyerATACannotHaveDelegate
errors.msg: Buyer ata cannot have a delegate set

errors.name: InvalidBasisPoints
errors.msg: BP must be less than or equal to 10000

errors.name: TradeStateDoesntExist
errors.msg: The trade state account does not exist

errors.name: TradeStateIsNotEmpty
errors.msg: The trade state is not empty

errors.name: InvalidHolyeer
errors.msg: Invalid Holyeer for this Holy House instance.

errors.name: MissingHolyeerScope
errors.msg: The Holyeer does not have the correct scope for this action.

errors.name: BumpSeedNotInHashMap
errors.msg: Bump seed not in hash map.

errors.name: EscrowUnderRentExemption
errors.msg: The instruction would drain the escrow below rent exemption threshold

errors.name: InvalidSeedsOrHolyHouseNotDelegated
errors.msg: Invalid seeds or Holy House not delegated

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in escrow account to purchase.
